channel.title: Awards Finder Blog
channel.description: Award travel tips, points guides, transfer partner strategies, and product updates from Awards Finder.

item.title: Beginner’s Guide to Points and Miles in 2025
item.description: New to award travel? Learn points/miles basics, alliances, transfers, and a step-by-step plan to your first redemption.

item.title: Star Alliance Sweet Spots (2025 Edition)
item.description: Top Star Alliance sweet spots: ANA roundtrips, Europe business class, Africa routes, and transfer paths with booking strategies.

item.title: Oneworld Business Class from North America
item.description: How to book AA, BA, Qatar, and Cathay business class from North America—pricing quirks, surcharges, and partner searches.

item.title: SkyTeam Awards: Finding Delta/AF/KLM Partner Space
item.description: Decode SkyTeam: calendars, married segments, Flying Blue Promo Rewards, transfer partners, and booking tips.

item.title: Best Uses of Amex Membership Rewards for Flights (2025)
item.description: Top Amex MR partners for 2025, when to transfer, and example sweet spots for outsized value.

item.title: Chase Ultimate Rewards: Top Airline Redemptions (2025)
item.description: Best Chase UR partners and routes: United, Aeroplan, Avios, Virgin, KrisFlyer—how and when to use each.

item.title: 9 Common Award Booking Mistakes (and How to Avoid Them) in 2025
item.description: Stop wasting points: avoid transfer timing errors, phantom space, surcharges, and routing pitfalls.

item.title: Using Alerts to Catch Last‑Minute Award Space
item.description: Set precise alerts to snag last‑minute seats. Timing windows, route strategies, and quick-booking tactics.

item.title: Stopovers and Open‑Jaws: More Value from Your Miles (2025 Guide)
item.description: Programs that allow stopovers/open‑jaws, practical itineraries, and pricing notes to stretch miles.

item.title: Family Award Travel: Finding 3+ Seats in Premium Cabins
item.description: Secure multiple premium seats with seasonal patterns, route selection, and precise alert strategies.

item.title: Transfer Partners 101: Getting More Value From Your Points
item.description: Understand transfer times, sweet spots, and aligning bank currencies with airline programs for outsized value.

item.title: How to Find Award Flights in 2025: A Practical Guide
item.description: A repeatable process for surfacing real award seats across alliances, with alert timing and transfer tactics.
